column4: - I downloaded ATI's drivers (after testing desktop effects without them--and it didn't work) ..
ATI's driver does not work out if the box for desktop effects (beryl or compiz) as it is missing the "Composite extension". You need another X-Server (Xgl) to get it working.
to avoid this, use the original radeon driver comming with Ubuntu, it should support effects and 3D acceleration on your 9800pro
